column4: what's command to check in terminal the uptime of server running ?
i want to use it in /etc/motd when someone open ssh it appear, how i can add it ?
there's isnt an easy way to do this apart from a cron job that outputs uptime to /etc/motd every other minute
u mean do crontab every min uptime and then redirect it to /etc/motd ?
do u know how to add color to /motd ?
can you rephrase your question its not entirely clear. You want to know how fast your CPU is?
, i want to check the performance of the CPU if it's good or not good! ex: on windows i used to check CPU performance if it hit 100% mean something wrong !! here. i can
htop is a good utility if you want to know what your clock cycles are being wasted on
yep top is good but not as user friendly as htop
